channel.title: NEED HELP! Troubled to make shops!
channel.description:
I made everything, I got no errors.. and I logged in my game, and going to check how my new shop doing, my shop NPC are Shop Keeper (ID = 555), I tried to talk with shop keeper, nothing happened.., and I tried to trade with shop keeper, its disconnect me?
Other shops are working normal.. =[
I will tell you what I did.
I added at AutoSpawn.cfg: [code]spawn = 555 2658 3310 0 2658 3310 2658 3310 2 range seller at ardougne[/code]
I added at Shops.cfg: [code]shop = 43 @gre@Range @whi@Stuffs 2 2 882 1000000 884 1000000 886 1000000 888 1000000 890 1000000 892 1000000 861 1000 859 1000 4121 1000 1099 1000 2493 1000 2495 1000 2497 1000 3749 1000[/code]
I added at Client.java: [code] else if (NPCID == 555) { // shop keeper at ardoughne selling range stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }[/code]
That all, did I did something wrong? How can I fix the shop? Thank you =]

item.title: NEED HELP! Troubled to make shops!
item.dc:creator: @tw1nz_ftw tw1nz ftw
item.description:
@tw1nz_ftw wrote:

else if (NPCID == 555) { // shop keeper at ardoughne selling range stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

Change the “NPCID == 555” to “NPCID == 520” .
Because you have 2 different npc id numbers.
You spawn a npc with id number 520, and you make a code that will open a npc shop with the number 555.

Hope you can understand it

Read full topic
item.source: NEED HELP! Troubled to make shops!

and my client.java:

else if (NPCID == 555) { // shop keeper at ardoughne selling range stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

item.title: NEED HELP! Troubled to make shops!
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Your ids do not match… notice the Wanneshop and the shop ID. Below is an example of a correctly working shop.

else if (NPCID == 3142) { // Firelighters PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 12; //Firelighters }

shop = 12	@whi@Firelighters	2	2	7329	100	7330	100	7331	100	1511	1000	590	1000

Read full topic
item.source: NEED HELP! Troubled to make shops!

item.title: NEED HELP! Troubled to make shops!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesy_G13 Cheesy_G13
item.description:
@Cheesy_G13 wrote:

I made everything, I got no errors… and I logged in my game, and going to check how my new shop doing, my shop NPC are Shop Keeper (ID = 555), I tried to talk with shop keeper, nothing happened…, and I tried to trade with shop keeper, its disconnect me?

Other shops are working normal… =[

I will tell you what I did.

I added at AutoSpawn.cfg:

spawn = 555	2658	3310	0	2658	3310	2658	3310	2	range seller at ardougne

I added at Shops.cfg:

shop = 43	@gre@Range @whi@Stuffs				2	2	882	1000000	884	1000000	886	1000000	888	1000000	890	1000000	892	1000000	861	1000	859	1000	4121	1000	1099	1000	2493	1000	2495	1000	2497	1000	3749	1000

I added at Client.java:

else if (NPCID == 555) { // shop keeper at ardoughne selling range stuff PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; }

That all, did I did something wrong? How can I fix the shop? Thank you =]

Read full topic
